item.title: Bio
item.description: Hello üëã, I am a PhD Candidate in Computer Science from University of Lorraine and an Engineer üéì graduated from Toulouse INP-ENSEEIHT in Computer Science and Telecommunications üíª. I did my preparatory classes at CPGE Mohamed V in Casablanca, Morocco. I went to a special high school, a military one üëÆ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è, the Prytan√©e Militaire de Kadiogo. My PhD activities are about classification and troubleshooting of Cloud Gaming applications and on low latency applications more broadly.
